sentence: Why did the baker rob the bank? he needed the dough.
explanation: Dough refers to a mixture of flour and water used to make bread and is also slang for money.
first_new_sentence: The baker kneaded the dough until it was smooth and elastic.
second_new_sentence: He invested his dough wisely in the stock market.

sentence: This entry fulfills all the criteria specified for selecting jokes based on a word with dual meanings. If you would like to explore more entries or need additional assistance, please let me know!
